server.description: Holds configuration options for the server itself.

address.description: The IP addres the server should listen on.

port.description: The port incoming connections should be accepted on.

database.description: Holds configuration options for the database.

path.description: The path to the databse folder. The folder must exist before the server is started.

drop_on_start_up.description: If set to `true`, the database will be deleted and recreated on server start up.

resource.description: Holds configuration options for the resource folder.

path.description: The path to the resource folder. The folder must exist before the server is started.
